column1: Smoque BBQ////Definitely be aware that there is going to be a wait to place an order
column2: with a line stretching out the door on most occasions.  Plus
column3: if you try to call it in to pick it up
column4: don't expect the standard...see you in 15 minutes
column5: as there is a wait to even secure a pick-up time.  Your best bet for a quick fix is to get there at off peak hours.
